question: What is your return policy?
answer: 📝 Our return policy allows you to return products within 7 days of delivery if they are defective or damaged. Please contact our support team at +91 98765 43210 for assistance.

question: How long does delivery take?
answer: 🚚 We usually deliver orders within 3-7 business days. You will receive a tracking link once your order is shipped.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: 💳 We accept UPI, debit cards, credit cards, and net banking. You can also pay via cash on delivery for selected products.

question: How do I track my order?
answer: 🔎 Once your order is shipped, you will receive an SMS/WhatsApp message with the tracking link.

question: Do you ship internationally?
answer: 🌍 Currently, we only ship within India. We will notify our customers when we expand internationally!

question: Can I cancel my order after placing it?
answer: ❌ You can cancel your order within 2 hours of placing it. After that, the order will be processed, and cancellation may not be possible. Contact support immediately for assistance.

question: Can I change my delivery address after placing an order?
answer: 📍 Yes, you can change your delivery address before your order is shipped. Contact our support team at +91 98765 43210 as soon as possible.

question: Do you offer Cash on Delivery (COD)?
answer: 💰 Yes! We offer COD for selected products and locations. You can check availability on the product page or during checkout.

question: How do I contact customer support?
answer: 📞 You can contact our support team via WhatsApp at +91 98765 43210 or email us at support@example.com. Our working hours are 10 AM - 7 PM, Monday to Saturday.

question: What if I receive a damaged product?
answer: 😔 We're sorry about that! If you receive a damaged product, please take clear pictures of the item and packaging and share them with our support team within 48 hours of delivery.

question: Do you offer gift wrapping services?
answer: 🎁 Yes, we offer gift wrapping at an additional charge. You can select this option during checkout!

question: Are your products covered under warranty?
answer: 🛡️ Yes, most of our electronic products come with a 6-month to 1-year warranty. You can check the product description for warranty details.

question: Can I return an item on sale?
answer: 🚫 Sale or discounted items are non-returnable unless they are damaged or defective.

question: How do I apply a discount coupon?
answer: 🏷️ You can apply your discount coupon at checkout. Enter the coupon code in the 'Apply Coupon' field and click on 'Apply'.

question: My payment failed, what should I do?
answer: ⚠️ If your payment failed but the amount was debited, it will be automatically refunded within 5-7 business days. You can also contact our support team with your transaction details.

question: Can I pre-order products?
answer: 🕒 Yes! Pre-order options are available for upcoming products. The expected delivery date will be mentioned on the product page.

question: How do I create an account?
answer: 👤 Click on the 'Sign Up' button on the top-right corner of our website. Enter your details and create a password to register your account.

question: I forgot my password, how do I reset it?
answer: 🔐 Click on 'Forgot Password' at the login page. Enter your registered email or mobile number to receive a password reset link.

question: How do I update my profile details?
answer: 📝 Log into your account and go to 'My Profile'. You can update your name, address, phone number, and other details there.

question: Do you have a loyalty program?
answer: 🏆 Yes! Join our loyalty program and earn points on every purchase. Points can be redeemed for discounts and exclusive offers.

question: What if I entered the wrong UPI ID for payment?
answer: 🚨 If you entered the wrong UPI ID, the payment will fail, and no amount will be deducted. Please double-check before making a payment.

question: Can I order in bulk for wholesale?
answer: 📦 Yes, we accept bulk orders. Contact our wholesale team at wholesale@example.com for special pricing and offers.

question: Is there a minimum order value?
answer: ✅ There is no minimum order value for retail customers. For wholesale or bulk orders, a minimum value applies. Contact our team for more details.

question: Where are you located?
answer: 📍 Our office and warehouse are located in Perumbavoor, Kerala, India. We deliver all over India!

question: Do you provide installation services?
answer: 🛠️ Yes, we provide installation services for selected electrical and electronic products within select cities. Contact us after purchase to schedule an installation.

question: Can I request a custom product?
answer: 🎨 We offer customization for certain products like gift boxes and apparel. Contact our support team with your requirements!

question: How do I know if a product is in stock?
answer: 📦 If a product is in stock, you will see the 'Add to Cart' button enabled. Out-of-stock products will be marked as 'Sold Out'.

question: What happens if my order is delayed?
answer: ⏳ We strive for on-time delivery, but delays can occur due to unforeseen circumstances. We will keep you informed and share regular updates.

question: Do you offer EMI options?
answer: 💳 Yes, EMI options are available on selected credit cards and payment gateways. You will see the EMI option during checkout if eligible.

question: How do I delete my account?
answer: 🗑️ To delete your account, please email us at support@example.com with your registered email ID. We will process your request within 7 working days.

question: What are your customer support hours?
answer: 🕘 Our customer support is available Monday to Saturday from 10 AM to 7 PM IST. We are closed on Sundays and public holidays.

question: Do you sell eco-friendly products?
answer: 🌱 Yes, we offer a range of eco-friendly and sustainable products. Look for the 'Eco-Friendly' label on the product page.

question: Can I reorder my previous orders?
answer: 🔄 Yes! Log in to your account, go to 'My Orders', and click on 'Reorder' for any past purchases.

question: Do you offer free shipping?
answer: 🚚 Free shipping is available on orders above ₹999. Below that, standard shipping charges apply depending on your location.

question: What is your refund policy?
answer: 💵 Refunds are processed within 7-10 business days after we receive and inspect the returned item. Refunds will be made to your original payment method.

question: What happens if I miss the delivery?
answer: 📦 If you miss the delivery, our courier partner will attempt delivery up to 3 times. After that, the product will be returned to us.

question: Do you offer seasonal sales or discounts?
answer: 🔥 Yes! We run seasonal sales during festivals and special occasions. Follow us on Instagram and Facebook for updates!
